QAPair.Question: What is (are) Carotid artery stenosis - self-care ?
QAPair.Answer: The carotid arteries provide the main blood supply to the brain. They are located on each side of your neck. You can feel their pulse under your jawline. Carotid artery stenosis occurs when the carotid arteries become narrowed or blocked. This can lead to stroke. Whether or not your doctor recommended surgery to unblock narrowed arteries, medicines and lifestyle changes can: Prevent further narrowing of these important arteries, Prevent a stroke from occurring ,
